direction.raw_text: I don't have to take a physical in your space ship?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heck, no!  What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.  What the hell?  You got a deal. Get in. She gets in. He gets in the back seat behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The front seat! He runs around to the front while Eve chats with herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why am I doing this? What in the hell is wrong with me? That's what I'd like to know. SCENE 99 OMITTED EXT. HOLLYWOOD FREEWAY - MINUTES LATER Traffic is moving at fifteen miles an hour. The dash lights fascinate him but the car scares him.  She notices that he is gripping the seat belt for dear life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So...Mister Andretti, your first time on the freeway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Webber.  Adam Webber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mind if I change the station? Better traffic reports on AM. She switches over to AM and runs by a Perry Como record, "Round and Round", looking for traffic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!  Wait!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Perry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perry Como!  You had him!  Go back! Go back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay!  Take it easy! She gets Perry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I could die...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Listen to this part. This is where it really takes off!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are one scary son-of-a-gun. EXT. FREEWAY Eve's car splits for the exit ramp. INT. EVE'S CAR The sudden speed scares Adam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, what are you doing?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know a short-cut. EXT. OFF RAMP She comes off, catches the light and whips onto the surface street, tires squealing. INT. CAR Adam is hanging onto his seat belt. Eve puts the pedal to the metal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gee-zooie!!  You better slow down!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't help it. Perry Como always does this to me! I just get so cranked! She turns Perry way up. EXT. AVENUE Eve does a dandy job of trading lanes and passing.  The little Geo's engine screams. Adam's sort of getting into it. EXT. HOLLYWOOD HOLIDAY INN - TEN MINUTES LATER The Geo flies up to a quick stop. INT. CAR Eve turns to Adam, who has had A Life Experience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Card, please.  End of service. He hands over the card like someone in a post-sex stupor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was...wonderful!  I've never felt anything like that in my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, same here. Don't forget your suitcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. He gets out with the suitcase, and after shutting the door leans down to speak to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know-- She tears off, leaving him there. INT. HOTEL REGISTRATION - MINUTES LATER Adam addresses the clerk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening. I want to stay at this hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fill this out please. And I'll need a card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A card?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course! Adam gives him a baseball card. INT. HOTEL ROOM - LATER SAME NIGHT A BELLBOY ushers Adam in and sets down his bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bathroom's there, TV's over there. Remote's on top. Room Service menu is on the table. Adam picks up the phone and listens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You dial nine to get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see.  Well, thank you very much. You've been very, very nice. He offers two dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was able to get some change downstairs and my father taught me that it's customary to tip in a situation such as this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Your father is a smart guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father is a genius.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No kiddin'. Well...good night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night!  Sleep tight.  Don't let the bedbugs bite!  That's what my Mom always says... (choking up) ...who I'm really beginning to miss. I'm sorry.  It's my first night away from home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How old are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thirty-five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't look thirty-five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes! Please, don't mention the Communists! INT. - DINING ROOM Helen hurries out of the kitchen to take her seat. The others are already there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve. I hope I'm not being nosey, but are you and Adam...um...dating?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Mrs. Webber we are. (then) I'm also from Pasadena. Helen nearly comes unglued. Calvin is pleased, too. He raises his tea cup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A toast! To Adam and Eve! The others also raise their cups and everyone clicks. Then they drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this sh...stuff?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hot Dr. Pepper! Most people don't know how good it is heated up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, they don't, do they? They begin to eat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about grace?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my goodness! We almost forgot! (then) I like your friend, Adam. They all join hands and lower their heads. Calvin leads them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you thought your parents were weird. EXT. BEAUTIFUL VALLEY NORTH OF LA - MORNING Adam and Eve are with a REAL ESTATE BROKER. The broker unlocks the gate of a chain-link fence and Adam and Eve step onto the property. The broker's Lexus is in the b.g.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's like the Garden of Eden, don't you think? Adam and Eve respond but we can't hear them under Eve's narration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see, that night, Adam had a choice between me and his parents. SCENE 173 OMITTED EXT. VALLEY PROPERTY - DAY Adam and Eve are working with a TEAM OF ARCHITECTS AND CONTRACTORS at the site of a new home. They have plans and are discussing dimensions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's truly amazing what you can get done when you have unlimited funds. Did you know you can have whole houses built in just a matter of months. All you have to say is this..."I don't care what it costs."  And then, of course, you've got to really mean it, which no one ever does. EXT. NEW HOUSE - DAY It is under construction. EXT. MELROSE RETRO FURNITURE STORE - DAY Adam, Eve and Troy enter. INT. RETRO STORE This is great stuff from the fifties and the sixties. Adam finds things very similar to what he grew up with. There's a lamp (or something) that's just like the lamp (or something) from the Webber living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That lamp is perfect!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm holding that for Elton John.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I think not. SCENE 176 OMITTED  (REFER TO SCENE 172D) EXT. STREET IN FRONT OF MALT SHOP (FLASHBACK) - NIGHT Adam and Eve embracing as Troy picks up baseball cards and the street people look on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve, I've got to go back! My parents can't handle this up here. And there was no bomb, was there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See! I can't tell them that!  I can't ever let them know. It makes their life..well, frankly... a joke.  I can't let that happen.  You understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can make this work, Adam! Believe me! I'm very good at making things work!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother's like that. They kiss again. INT. MALT SHOP - DAY Eve and Troy are showing large color drawings to the Soda Jerk.  In CU we see the Malt Shop exterior all dolled up with a big lighted sign that says "GIVE ME SHELTER." There's valet parking and the Adult Bookstore and Bar have been turned into a Souvenir Center (think Planet Hollywood).  Another drawing shows fashionable guests boarding the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It took a while to convince Archbishop Milker that Adam wasn't God, and he was pretty broken up about it, too, until I showed him my plans for Los Angeles' hottest and most original night spot. Other drawings show dancing on the shelter patio and guided tours being shown various parts of the shelter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll be a ten percent partner and still retain ownership of the entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Praise the Lord.  And I mean the real one. EXT. BEAUTIFUL VALLEY NORTH OF L.A. - TWO MONTHS LATER A 1962 Cadillac leads a 1962 windowless van through automatic gates that have signs on them saying:  PRIVATE ROAD and NO TRESPASSING. Troy drives the van. Eve drives the Cadillac. Adam is her passenger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our idea was to bring Adam's parents up to the surface very slowly.  Make them very comfortable and then break the bad news to them that there was no nuclear holocaust. And if that doesn't kill them Adam's going to tell his father about the Internet. EXT. EXACT REPLICA OF THE WEBBER HOUSE - DAY The cars pull up and Adam lets his parents out. They go bonkers when they see the house. INT. LIVING ROOM - MOMENTS LATER The parents enter first. They are thrilled, shocked, etc. INT. KITCHEN - MOMENTS LATER As a demonstration, Troy removes a hot cup of coffee from the microwave.  Helen is happy to see this handy new device.  Calvin, the inventor, sticks his head into the machine to investigate its workings. INT. FAMILY ROOM - MOMENTS LATER Adam demonstrates the VCR to his parents as Troy and Eve look on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You put the tape in here and you get a movie -- in your own home. We see the main title to Natural Born Killers come up on the screen. Troy and Eve rush forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!! INT. ADAM'S BEDROOM - SAME TIME It has been turned into an office for Calvin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is your bedroom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Mom, I've turned it into Dad's office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, where are you -- ADAM Eve and I...eloped.  We're married.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's wonderful, dear! Wonderful!! They hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calvin!  They're married!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's wonderful. We Webber guys have mighty good luck when it comes to women. Calvin points out the computer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's kind of a combination television- typewriter-telephone-post office type of thing. (leading Calvin out) I'll show it to you later. EXT. PATIO - AN HOUR LATER Adam and Calvin exit the house. They wear baseball gloves and start playing catch. (Calvin notes the modern construction of his glove, but does not comment on it.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is great son, just great. By the way, Eve's last name. Rus-to-kov, that's not Russian, is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Ukrainian. Her grandparents immigrated here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, I don't know how to tell you this. And I was going to wait a while, but I think...Dad,there was no bomb. A plane crashed into our backyard. I looked it up in old newspapers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Positive. The Soviet Union collapsed without a shot being fired. The Cold War is over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what everybody believes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. It's true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Did the politburo just one day say - "We give up?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. That's kind of how it was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. Adam throws the ball, but Calvin makes no attempt to catch it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My gosh, those Commies are brilliant! You've got to hand it to 'em!  "No, we didn't drop any bombs!  Oh yes, our evil empire has collapsed!  Poor, poor us!"  I bet they've even asked the West for aid!  Right?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I think they have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hah!!! Those cagey rascals! Those sly dissemblers! Those, uh... (he can't think of another description, so he moves on) They've finally pulled the wool over everybody's eyes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever in your life seen a son who did more for his parents? Helen comes out with a tray of champagne cocktails.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adam says that this is simply how things work.  First the parents take care of the children and then the children take care of the parents. He says historically, that's how it works. INT. LIVING ROOM Eve and Troy are sitting by the window.  Adam and Helen come in to offer cocktails to Troy and Eve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whenever Adam gives me such obviously incorrect information, I just smile, slap him on the knee, and look out the window. Why spoil his dreams?  They're such wonderful dreams. The CAMERA wanders off of them and shoots out the glass doors. We see Calvin behind the house...measuring off the dimensions for a fallout shelter. EXT. HOUSE - CONTINUOUS Calvin continues to measure as we pull way back and up. Perry Como sings "We'll Meet Again".
direction.name: direction
